about_me.my_story_p1: My name is Jose Martinez, I'm 37 and I'm a software developer.
about_me.my_story_p2: I'm working as a developer since 2007. I've worked for different companies, including large firms such as Capgemini. Besides, in 2019 I moved to UK to join AND Digital, company I'm working for since then.
about_me.my_story_p3: Fun fact about me: One night I was waiting for a friend to pick me up, then when he came and I was getting in the car I found out the driver wasn't him... After some screams from the driver I could convince her it was a mistake and I wasn't a thieve.
about_me.my_story_p4: Then, due to current travel restrictions, I would like to move back to Spain and work remotely from Murcia, my home town.
about_me.my_skills_p1: I'm a full-stack programmer with a great knowledge of consulting and software development, especially focused on web and backend, with extensive experience in .Net and React. Also, in the last months I'm learning kotlin/android, platform in which I've already published 3 apps. Have a look at my
